name: Evil Monkeys - Game 1
description:
Evil Monkeys

You are a wizard who has found himself stuck in a dungeon full of ferocious monkeys who are trying to kill you.

How to play
Move - Arrow keys or WASD
Fire  - Space

Project

This is game 1 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and check out my social media from the main menu or game description.

Give me some feedback: https://www.surveymonkey.co.uk/r/LHS87FM
